text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to advise that Irrevocable Powers of Attorney (POA) must be used for the Drag-Along clause to overcome the mandatory notarial execution requirement for share transfers in a GmbH (GmbHG \u00a715). The candidate answer discusses Drag-Along rights (Point 1) and mentions that GmbHG \u00a753 allows it via SHA, but it *does not* mention or advise on the necessity of using Irrevocable Powers of Attorney (POA) to bypass the notarial execution requirement under GmbHG \u00a715 for the drag-along mechanism to be effective.", "criterion_id": "fef48e03-e31a-4f54-b43c-03457f162075"}
